title: How to Learn Cyber Security
content: Cyber security is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and data from digital attacks. To start learning cyber security, begin with understanding the basics of computer networks, operating systems, and common security threats like malware, phishing, and denial-of-service attacks. Study topics such as encryption, firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and ethical hacking. You can also explore online resources, certifications like CompTIA Security+, and platforms like TryHackMe or Hack The Box for hands-on experience. Consistent practice, curiosity, and staying updated with the latest security trends are essential for building a strong foundation in cyber security.
author: Asad Shah
